title: Updated Beauty! Hardwood Floors!
posting_body: Apartments have charm, character and comfort.
Whether you choose a one or two bedroom apartment home, your residential needs will consistently be catered to by our pleasant and welcoming staff.
Our residents enjoy a convenient location near the DFW airport and North East Mall in a comfortable atmosphere.

Community features 4 Resort Style Pools, Carport Parking Available, Ceiling Fans, Dog Park, Energy Efficient Appliances, Fireplace, Hardwood Floors, Multi-Million Dollar Renovation, Online Rental Payments, Play Ground, Private Patio, Washer and Dryer Connections!  ***********************Please Call Desiree with DASH Realty
